mean_en: to become solid; to make something solid; (of ideas, etc.) to become or to make something become more definite and less likely to change
sentence: The yellow liquid in the mould soon solidified into jelly.
sentence_trans: 模具中的黄色液体很快凝固成了果冻。
word_etyma: solid团结 + ify表动词 → solidify使凝固，（使）团结，巩固
